_PAGE_FILTER_PROPERTY_BY_VALUE_ARGUMENTS: The value that should be mapped to a property in the mapping object
An object that defines the mapping of values to properties
The default value returned if the passed value is not found in the mapping object
_PAGE_FILTER_PROPERTY_BY_VALUE_DESCRIPTI: The function filterPropertyByValue allows for mapping values to predefined properties in a mapping object. It checks if the passed value exists as a key in the mapping object. If so, the associated property is returned; otherwise, the default value is used.
